name: subdl-subtitle-finder
title: Subdl Subtitle Finder
description: Search and download Arabic and international movie/TV subtitles from SubDL.com with quality filtering
author: sal2049

commands.name: search-subtitles
commands.title: Search Subtitles
commands.subtitle: SubDL
commands.description: Search and download movie/TV subtitles with language and quality filtering

preferences.name: subdlApiKey
preferences.title: SubDL API Key
preferences.description: Your SubDL API key from subdl.com (required for searching subtitles)

preferences.name: downloadDirectory
preferences.title: Download Directory
preferences.description: Choose where to save downloaded subtitles (defaults to Downloads folder)

preferences.name: showMovieInfo
preferences.title: Show Movie Information
preferences.label: Display movie details and posters
preferences.description: Show rich movie information using OMDb API (requires OMDb API key)

preferences.name: omdbApiKey
preferences.title: OMDb API Key (Optional)
preferences.description: OMDb API key for movie information and posters (get free key from omdbapi.com)

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
